pr_title: Add support for `@deprecated` directive without any deprecation reason

timeline.message:
Add support for `@deprecated` directive without any deprecation reason

They will fall back to 'No longuer supported'

Fixes #2664

timeline.author: sav007
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -80,8 +80,7 @@ internal data class ObjectType(
       val type: FieldType,
       val description: String,
       val isOptional: Boolean,
-      val isDeprecated: Boolean,
-      val deprecationReason: String,
+      val deprecationReason: String?, // null if not deprecated
